definition: to wake up to reality/to come to oneself/to realize/to see the truth
to save/to economize/to do without/to omit/to leave out/province/(archaic) central government department
to inspect/to examine/to be aware/to pay a visit (to one's parents or elders)
to comprehend/to apprehend/to become aware

sentences.english: Why don't you regret yourself first before becoming my student?
sentences.chinese: 你向我求法，为何不先省悟自己？

sentences.english: And if one thinks one knows, one is quickly disabuse.
sentences.chinese: 假如我们认为我们知道，我们很快就会省悟过来。

sentences.english: perceive ye not yet, neither understand?
sentences.chinese: 你们还不省悟，还不明白吗。
